name: Knocky Balls
description:
Having a bad day? Don't punch the wall. Take it out on some inanimate blocks. Just throw balls and knock down stacks of blocks. It will make you feel much better.

Where to get

Knocky Balls for Android (Google Play)

Knocky Balls for Android (Amazon Appstore)

Knocky Balls for Windows (Amazon PC download)

Knocky Balls for Windows (Microsoft Store)
